title: Origin: Spirits of the Past FULL ISO
description:
This is a full rip of the DVD. It contains English and Japanese audio with English subtitles.

Directors: Keiichi Sugiyama
Format: Animated, Color, DVD-Video, Subtitled, NTSC
Language: English, Japanese
Subtitles: English
Aspect Ratio: 1.33:1
Rating: Unrated 
Studio: Funimation Prod
DVD Release Date: February 20, 2007
Run Time: 90 minutes

I decided to put the full disk image up because when trying to rip just the movie, I got Japanese text at the intro and at the end.  If anyone can rip it so that the English text is ripped as it appears in the movie please do and point to it in the comments.  I will gladly seed your torrent.
